key: Item-Case 3-5-Transmutation Magic on the Guard Rails 2-displayName
Item-Case 3-5-Transmutation Magic on the Guard Rails 2-description
original: There are magical traces of transmutation on the guard rail that Justin supposedly broke before falling. These traces are only on the rails that Justin broke. They aren't anywhere else on the walkwayâ€¦ A mage must have sabotaged the guard rail within the last 48 hours. They clearly intended for someone to break the rail and fall into the vat.
